plot: Trapped in the reality of his own domain, J.D. is unable to escape the fact that his life will never be the same. He must choose to accept the fateful of events of the day before or continue running.
title: Flowers
plot_es: Trapped in the reality of his own domain, J.D. is unable to escape the fact that his life will never be the same. He must choose to accept the fateful of events of the day before or continue running.
